USE_THIS_FORM_TO_CLAIM: CY Use this form to claim Child Benefit if you or your partner are responsible for a child who is under 16, or under 20 if they are in
USE_THIS_FORM_TO_CLAIM_CONTD: CY approved education or training (opens in new tab)
ONLY_ONE_PERSON_CAN: CY Only one person can claim Child Benefit.
IF_YOU_ARE_IN_COUPLE: CY If you are in a couple and one of you does not work or earns less than £242 a week, it is recommended for that person to claim to help protect their state pension. They should fill out this form.
YOU_DONT_NEED_TO_BE_PARENT: CY You do not need to be the parent of the child to claim Child Benefit.
CLAIM_AS_SOON_AS_BABY_IS_BORN: CY Claim as soon as your baby is born and registered or once a child comes to live with you, including adoption.
CHILD_MUST_BE_UNDER_16: CY To claim, the child must either be under 16 or under 20 and in full-time, non-advanced education or approved training.
TO_COMPLETE_THIS_FORM_YOU_NEED: CY To complete this form, you’ll need the following documents for any children you areapplying for, depending on your circumstance
PASSPORT_OR_TRAVEL_DOCUMENT: CY passport or travel documents used to enter the UK
YOUR_BANK_OR_BUILDING_DETAILS: CY your bank or building society details
PARTNERS_NINUMBER: CY your partner’s National Insurance number, if you have a partner
DO_NOT_DELAY_MAKING: CY Do not delay making your claim as Child Benefit can only be backdated up to 3 months.
IF_YOU_HAVE_ANY_QUESTIONS_REG_CHB: CY If you have any questions about Child Benefit
CONTACT_THE_CHILD_BENEFIT_HELPLINE: CY contact the Child Benefit helpline
OPENS_IN_NEW_TAB: CY Is this page not working properly?OPENS_IN_NEW_TAB
CLAIM_LISTING_DESCRIPTION: CY We're only listing your cases that need completing for information on claims or  applications that have been submitted. Use the contact information to speak with a Benefits Officer
CALL_THE_CHB_HELPLINE: CY Call the Child Benefit helpline if you need to speak with us or use the chat
APPLICATION_FOR_CHB_COMPLETE: CY Application for Child Benefit complete
WE_HAVE_SENT_YOUR_APPLICATION: CY We've sent your application to Child Benefit Service.
WE_WILL_TELL_YOU_IN_14_DAYS: CY We'll tell you in 14 calendar days if your application has been successful.
YOU_ARE_ABOUT_TO_SIGNOUT: CY You're about to be sign out
YOU_STILL_NEED_TO_SAVE_YOUR_PROGRESS: CY You still need to save your progress. If you sign out without saving, your progress will be lost.
TO_SAVE_YOUR_PROGRESS: CY To save your progress, select the 'Save and come back later' link.
